name: Rock Star Bowling - Game Jam Edition
name_original: Rock Star Bowling - Game Jam Edition
description:
Welcome to the Game Jam edition of Rock Star Bowling!

Game Objective - You can drive your star in any direction.  Race against the clock to knock down all 10 pins.  Try to beat the quickest time!

Controls: 

  • WASD or arrow keys: control your star
  • 'R' - quick restart

Developer's notes:

  •  Didn't have time to implement a quit button.  Sorry!  You'll have to force close this one.  I'll get it implemented in the main version.
  • This was my first game.  It roughly took 18 hours from start to complete.
  • This was also the first time I have used Unreal Engine.
